short_summary: Provide Graphic Design Professional Services for the Net-Zero Advisory Body (NZAB)
description: The period of the contract is from contract award to March 31, 2024 inclusive with the option to extend the term of the contract by up to four (4) additional one-year periods under the same conditions.
full_summary:
# Net-Zero Advisory Board (NZAB) Graphics Design

## Request for Proposal
**Reference Number**: cb-8209-74532782
**Amendment Number**: 4
**Solicitation Number**: 5000071501
**Solicitation Date**: August 17, 2023

## Closing Date
This solicitation is closed (Exired). Closing date was on **September 15, 2023** at **14:00:00**.

## Description of Requirements
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is part of a **Competitive - Traditional** procurement process to acquire professional services. The successful supplier will provide Graphic Design services for Environment and Climate Change Canada to support the work of the Net-Zero Advisory Board (NZAB). The deliverables will include standard templates and promotional materials under the terms specified in the Statement of Work (Annex A). The contract period will be until **March 31, 2024** with the possibility of a four-year extension (one year each year).

## Procurement Details
- **Procurement Category**: SRV
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional (Concurrentielle - Traditionnelle)
- **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
- **Notice URL**: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8209/amd-001---qa---en_fr.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8209/amd-002---qa---en_fr.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8209/amd-003---qa---en_fr-_0.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8209/5000071501_0.zip, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8209/amd-to-rfp-002-en_fr.zip

## Contact Information
**Name**: Anne-Marie Boucher
**Email**: anne-marie.boucher@ec.gc.ca
**Phone**: (819) 307-7492
